scripts.coverage: coffee -co lib src && sh scripts/run-jscoverage.sh lib .cov && SRC_DIR=.cov mocha --compilers coffee:coffee-script --reporter mocha-term-cov-reporter spec/test.coffee
scripts.pretest: coffee -co lib src && mkdir -p spec/.output/expect && sh scripts/run-jscoverage.sh spec/scaffolding/scaffold spec/.output/expect/scaffold && sh scripts/run-jscoverage.sh spec/scaffolding/oss spec/.output/expect/oss
